name: Isekai Manager
description:
We made this game for about three days for Dilo Game Jams 2019, we make a simple Visual Novel with branches choice, in this game you must choose between Knight or Maid who will you choose to go to Heaven or Hell.

Thanks to all my team:

Programer :

Hubaka

Ilham Pro

Pray

Art Designer :

Ilham Art

Background Designer :

Almando

Game Designer :

MIchael

Leave us a comment if you like this project, hopefully in the future we can develop this game even further. Have a Nice Day :)
